a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: History’s hockey stick: Worldwide historical real gross domestic product
Unit 1 'The capitalist revolution’ in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available at: https://tinyco.re/19274920 [Figure 1.1a]
Note: The units of measurement is 2011 US dollar which is used to compare Purchasing Power Parity and GDP across countries over time.
